content.body:
> <@devsnek:matrix.org> how do i coax people to review and merge wpt prs https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/36733

They are merged after the corresponding spec change is merged, generally.

content.body: I need to get safari or Firefox to implement this
and spec wants safari or firefox
Well they should be able to express interest in shipping, which unlocks the spec, which unlocks the tests, which unlocks the ability to actually land code.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Well they should be able to express interest in shipping, which unlocks the spec, which unlocks the tests, which unlocks the ability to actually land code.

content.body: then we should be able to merge the spec I guess
do I need them to like comment on the spec pr or something to make the interest official
Or some public indication of willingness to ship
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Or some public indication of willingness to ship

content.body: Dominic Farolino: it works if the algorithm can be invoked inside "in parallel" only; but yeah, if you want to run it on the main thread that's a no-go

content.body: snek: https://whatwg.org/working-mode#changes is the process for a change. All of these things can be prepared in parallel or in sequence, but typically any kind of merging happens only after they are all deemed in order by the editor.
